manifest_description.message: Find scientific names on the visible document.

error.message: Either there was a problem with NameSpotter or you lost your Internet connection.

popup_no_names.message: No scientific names were found on this document.

options_hook_description.message: Type a URL that can accept a POST request. Data POSTed is a JSON object of unique names on the page. e.g. { "url" : "http://www.example.com", "names" : ["Pardosa","Pardosa distincta","Pardosa moesta"] }
